name: Sustainable Urban Agriculture Technologies Institute
description: A compact research organization focused on advancing sustainable urban agriculture technologies.

units.name: Research Unit
units.description: Responsible for conducting primary research and feasibility studies on urban agriculture technologies.

roles.name: Lead Researcher
roles.description: Oversees all research activities and ensures alignment with organizational goals.

roles.name: Research Analyst
roles.description: Conducts data collection and analysis for research projects.

units.name: Development Unit
units.description: Focuses on the engineering and prototyping of new urban agriculture technologies.

roles.name: Development Manager
roles.description: Leads the development of prototypes and ensures technical feasibility.
responsibilities: Coordinate with research and business units
Evaluate prototypes for efficiency and sustainability

roles.name: Engineer
roles.description: Designs and tests prototypes for urban agriculture technologies.

units.name: Community Outreach Unit
units.description: Engages with communities to promote urban agriculture technologies and gather feedback.

roles.name: Outreach Coordinator
roles.description: Plans and executes community engagement activities.

roles.name: Community Engagement Specialist
roles.description: Facilitates workshops and provides support for community projects.
responsibilities: Provide technical assistance to community members

units.name: Business Development Unit
units.description: Responsible for the commercialization of technologies and securing funding.

roles.name: Business Development Manager
roles.description: Identifies market opportunities and manages partnerships.

roles.name: Marketing Specialist
roles.description: Promotes the organization's technologies and initiatives.

workflows.name: Technology Development Workflow
workflows.description: A process to develop and launch new urban agriculture technologies.

stages.name: Research and Analysis
stages.description: Conduct initial research and feasibility studies.

stages.name: Prototype Development
stages.description: Develop and test prototypes based on research findings.

stages.name: Community Feedback
stages.description: Engage with communities to gather feedback on prototypes.

stages.name: Commercialization
stages.description: Market the developed technology and secure partnerships.
